#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
int in(){int r=0,c;for(c=getchar();c<=32;c=getchar());if(c=='-') return -in();for(;c>32;r=(r<<1)+(r<<3)+c-'0',c=getchar());return r;}
 
int can[1010];
void solve(){
  int N=in();
  int K=in();
  int i,j,x;
  memset(can,0,sizeof can);
  can[0]=1;
  for(i=0;i<N;i++){
    x=in();
	for(j=1000-x;j>=0;j--){
		if(can[j]){
			can[j+x]=1;
			//cout<<i<<" J: "<<j<<" X: "<<x<<" "<<can[x]<<" J+X: "<<j+x<<" "<<can[j+x]<<endl;
		}
	}
	if(can[K]){
		break;
	}
  }
  i++;
  
  for(;i<N;i++) in();
  
  if(can[K]) puts("1");
  else puts("0");
}
 
int main(){
  for(int i=0,T=in();i<T;i++)
      solve();
}
